Python.Name: Introduction to Python
Python.Content: This module covers Python basics: installation, syntax, and first program. Learn about Python's features, use cases, and interactive mode. Includes hands-on exercises for writing and running simple scripts.

Python.Name: Variables and Data Types
Python.Content: Explore Python's variables, naming conventions, and fundamental data types: integers, floats, strings, and booleans. Practice type conversion and memory management through coding exercises.

Python.Name: Operators and Expressions
Python.Content: Master arithmetic, comparison, logical, and assignment operators. Learn operator precedence and build complex expressions. Includes real-world problem-solving scenarios.

Python.Name: Control Flow - If, Else, Elif
Python.Content: Implement decision-making with conditional statements. Create branching programs using if-elif-else structures. Practice with grading systems and login authentication examples.

Python.Name: Loops - For and While
Python.Content: Automate repetitive tasks using iteration constructs. Learn loop control with break/continue. Implement number guessing games and pattern generation exercises.

Python.Name: Functions and Scope
Python.Content: Create reusable code with functions. Understand parameters, return values, and variable scope. Build modular programs and practice recursion concepts.

Python.Name: Lists and Tuples
Python.Content: Manage collections with lists and tuples. Learn slicing, methods, and immutability differences. Implement shopping cart systems and student record management.

Python.Name: Dictionaries and Sets
Python.Content: Store key-value pairs with dictionaries. Handle unique elements with sets. Practice with phonebook applications and data deduplication challenges.

Python.Name: File Handling
Python.Content: Read/write files in different modes. Handle CSV and JSON data. Build a personal diary application and data export/import systems.

Python.Name: Object-Oriented Programming
Python.Content: Implement classes, objects, inheritance. Learn encapsulation and polymorphism. Build a library management system with OOP principles.

Python.Name: Modules and Packages
Python.Content: Create and use custom modules. Understand Python package structure. Practice with math operations and third-library integrations.

Python.Name: Exception Handling
Python.Content: Handle errors with try-except blocks. Create custom exceptions. Build robust programs with proper error recovery mechanisms.

Python.Name: Working with Databases
Python.Content: Connect to SQLite/MySQL. Perform CRUD operations. Develop a simple ORM system and inventory management application.

Python.Name: Web Scraping with Python
Python.Content: Use BeautifulSoup/Scrapy. Extract web data ethically. Build price comparison tools and news aggregators.

Python.Name: Automation with Python
Python.Content: Automate file management and web interactions. Create email bots and schedule tasks. Implement office productivity tools.

Python.Name: Data Science and Machine Learning Basics
Python.Content: Introduction to Pandas/NumPy. Implement linear regression. Build a simple prediction model with scikit-learn.

Excel.Name: Excel Interface Basics
Excel.Content: Master ribbons, worksheets, and cell navigation. Learn custom views and basic data entry. Includes personal budget setup exercise.

Excel.Name: Formulas and Functions
Excel.Content: Create SUM/AVERAGE formulas. Use VLOOKUP/IF functions. Build dynamic grade calculators and financial models.

Excel.Name: Data Visualization
Excel.Content: Create charts and pivot tables. Design dashboards. Practice sales report visualizations.

C++.Name: C++ Syntax Fundamentals
C++.Content: Learn data types, variables, and I/O operations. Understand compilers. Build console calculator applications.

C++.Name: Object-Oriented Programming in C++
C++.Content: Implement classes/objects. Master inheritance/polymorphism. Develop banking system prototypes.

C++.Name: Memory Management
C++.Content: Understand pointers/dynamic memory. Prevent memory leaks. Practice with custom data structures.
